abstract: The venture capital firm prefers to invest in early-stage companies. “We try our best to skate to where the puck is going,” said Rob S. Chandra, a Bessemer partner.

lead_paragraph: These days, owning a slice of Facebook or Groupon — two of the most popular and valuable companies on the Web — is worth at least some bragging rights in Silicon Valley.

headline.main: Bessemer Venture Partners Closes $1.6 Billion Fund
